channel.title: Help a noob out!
channel.description:
Hey, I wanna make a p ring, how do i change the stats of the item
Im using 317
also, in my sources homes theirs thieving stalls.
how can i change how much money they give?
and on my spellbook tab, i wanna change where some of the stuff teles you. please help!

item.title: Help a noob out!
item.dc:creator: @sinji76 sinji76
item.description:
@sinji76 wrote:

Thanks a lot

And yeah, sorry. its my first time coding a server D:!

I’ll get the hang of it sooner or later.

EDIT:

How do i spawn an npc, then make it always stay there even when i restart server? and how to i make object do the same.

Also, how can i make a command for inf hp?

Read full topic

item.title: Help a noob out!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

Lol I don’t use p ring for my powered thing…I use my custom item…
;p But its a good thing to know how to change the stats of a weapon/amour…

Also the 99999’s are the stat and the 1469 is the price for high alch , low alch…and store price

Don’t ask why I put it 1469.99280576915…;p

ahh i hate when ppl just come how i add p ring its basic…

item.title: Help a noob out!
item.dc:creator: @Mr_x1 Mr...x..
item.description:
@Mr_x1 wrote:

Pring = high stat… :
Go to config…Then item.cfg then find the p ring id…which is 773 i think?
Then

item = 773	'perfect'_ring	A_perfect_ruby_ring.	1469.99280576915	1469.99280576915	1760.58823743125	99999	99999	99999	99999	99999	99999	99999	99999	99999	99999	99999	99999

Replace then old pring thing and put that in…

Next
thieving stalls; how to change amount of item gave to player :

if(objectID == Stall object Id){ TheifStall("gem stall", "and recieve 200k", 80, 1000*playerLevel[17], 995, 200000, 0x340); }
What this means:
Gem stall is what its called. “and recieve 200k” is the last part of what it says when U steal from it…
the 80 means the lvl u need to be to do it…
995, 200000 means the item id and the amount of the item (995=coin) (200000=200k)

Thats all you need to worry about unless u want to change how long u have to wait between each steal.

spell book teleports :
First get the coords of the teleport you wish to change. then type the y or x doesn’t matter which one in the search thing in “ClickingMost.java” Then just change the coords to what you want

Hope I helped if Something doesn’t make sense just post a reply or add me coolman867@live.ca on msn and Ill fix your problem

You have to go to clickingMost.java

Read full topic
